mapper.select: SELECT A.INQUIRY_NO, A.USER_NO, A.NAME, A.EMAIL, A.AUTH, A.PRODUCT_NO, A.INQUIRY_TITLE, A.INQUIRY_CONTENTS, A.IP, A.CREATED_AT, A.ANSWER_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY INQ.INQUIRY_NO DESC) AS RN, INQ.INQUIRY_NO, INQ.INQUIRY_TITLE, INQ.INQUIRY_CONTENTS, INQ.IP, INQ.CREATED_AT, U.USER_NO, U.NAME, U.AUTH, U.EMAIL, INQ.PRODUCT_NO, ANS.ANSWER_NO FROM USER_T U RIGHT OUTER JOIN INQUIRY_T INQ ON U.USER_NO = INQ.USER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN INQUIRY_ANSWER_T ANS ON INQ.INQUIRY_NO = ANS.INQUIRY_NO) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_T U LEFT OUTER JOIN INQUIRY_T INQ ON INQ.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT A.INQUIRY_NO, A.PRODUCT_NO, A.INQUIRY_TITLE, A.INQUIRY_CONTENTS, A.IP, A.CREATED_AT, A.USER_NO, A.NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY INQUIRY_NO DESC) AS RN, INQ.INQUIRY_NO, INQ.PRODUCT_NO, INQ.INQUIRY_TITLE, INQ.INQUIRY_CONTENTS, INQ.IP, INQ.CREATED_AT, U.USER_NO, U.NAME FROM USER_T U LEFT OUTER JOIN INQUIRY_T INQ ON INQ.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%') A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT INQ.INQUIRY_NO, INQ.INQUIRY_TITLE, INQ.INQUIRY_CONTENTS, INQ.IP, INQ.CREATED_AT , U.USER_NO, U.NAME, U.AUTH , PR.PRODUCT_NO, PR.TRIP_NAME FROM INQUIRY_T INQ RIGHT OUTER JOIN USER_T U ON U.USER_NO = INQ.USER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_T PR ON PR.PRODUCT_NO = INQ.PRODUCT_NO WHERE INQ.INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryNo}
